snippet: Hezbollah, which has intervened on behalf of its ally, the Syrian government, is trying to cement control of the Lebanese frontier in a complex conflict.
abstract: Syrian government troops and Hezbollah fighters from Lebanon push into Syrian border town of Zabadani in midst of heavy airstrikes, continuing effort to expel insurgents and strengthen government control of supply route between Lebanon and Syria.
lead_paragraph: Hezbollah, which has intervened on behalf of its ally, the Syrian government, is trying to cement control of the Lebanese frontier in a complex conflict.

headline.main: Syrian Forces and Hezbollah Push to Bolster Border Control
headline.print_headline: Syrian Forces and Hezbollah Fight Insurgents for Control of Border, and Routes
